pageContent: I'm really excited in 2025, you can see the ecosystem take the forefront of what we're doing. We have institutions. We have the technology. It's time for us to build up our ecosystem of builders.

Aptos tech and devs all play at the bleeding edge of web3. Itâ€™s no surprise that Aptos is the fastest-growing Move community and the second fastest-growing web3 ecosystem in the world. Supporting and growing the ambitious Aptos builders and community, pushing the boundaries of innovation in web3 technology, and high-velocity pioneering products are my immediate priorities for this next chapter. Iâ€™m going to hit the ground running.

Thank you Mo Shaikh for your passion and belief in our shared mission. We have accomplished much together in a short time. I want to personally thank Mo for his relentless dedication and belief in our shared mission. I look forward to his role as a strategic advisor to Aptos Labs, and his future endeavors.

Libra was my first love. Aptos is the heir to the vision of Libra, but so much more. Open finance means two things. First, it means that anyone can access financial infrastructure and assets around the world at any time. Second, developers can integrate financial products without any permission required. DeFi is the start, TradFi on-chain assets are the bridge, but the future is a world where the worldâ€™s economic activities move on-chain. Aptos is the only chain with the worldâ€™s most scalable and cost-efficient web3 infrastructure to match the pace of innovation in these spaces - holding the top 4 records for daily mainnet transactions. While weâ€™ve already announced significant upcoming innovations in rAPTr, Block-STM v2, and Move 2, thereâ€™s a massive new infrastructure initiative we will announce in 2025 that will bring on a new wave of pioneering developers and projects.

The real MVPs of Aptos are the community and builders. Seeing your excitement and passion in X/spaces, TG groups, VCs, and IRL drives me to push harder for all of you. I am here for you. Regional growth in India, Korea, Vietnam, Japan, and China will explode in 2025. I look forward to meeting you, most importantly, having fun together on this journey, and doubling down on expanding the Aptos ecosystem.
Much more to share in the coming days. This is just the beginning of the next phase.
